mods.tableOfContents: v.1. Twice-told tales.- v.2. Mosses from an old manse.- v.3. The house of seven gables. The snow-image and other twice-told tales.- v.4. A wonder-book for girls and boys. Tanglewood tales. The whole history of grandfather's chair.- v.5. The scarlet letter. The Blithedale ramance.- v.6. The marble faun or, The romance of Monte Beni.- v.7-8. Our old home. Passages from the English note-books of Nathaniel Hawthorne.- v.9. Passages from the American note-books.- v.10. Passages from the French and Italian note-books.- v.11. The Dolliver romance. Fanshawe. Septimius Felton. The ancestral footstep.- v.12. Tales and sketches, Biographical stories. Biographical sketches.- v.13. Doctor Grimshawe's secret; a romance.- v.14-15. Nathaniel Hawthorne and his wife; a biography.
mods.note: With introductory notes by George Parsons Lathrop and Nathaniel Hawthorne and his wife. A biography by Julian Hawthorne. Illustrated with etchings and engravings on steel. --
